subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Still recovering from a broken shin and torn ligaments, Penn State coach Joe Paterno stepped briefly on the sideline before retiring to the safety of the press box to watch his Nittany Lions defeat Tennessee 20-10.
snippet: Still recovering from a broken shin and torn ligaments, Penn State coach Joe Paterno stepped briefly on the sideline before retiring to the safety of the press box to watch his Nittany Lions defeat Tennessee 20-10.
